title: How to write a letter to your headmaster discussing three problems that impede academic work in your school - Quora

response.answer_text: Be simple. First, don’t play hardball or sound emotional. You want to share some insights, not provoke a revolution (at least not at first). State the three problems in the first paragraph. Then, in three subsequent paragraphs, provide more detail on each problem and why it’s a problem. Finally (last paragraph) offer to discuss further.
